description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Master the art of absorbing your enemies! Be the last orb alive by changing into a color that destroys your enemies and makes you stronger. New and more challenging orbs await as you progress to the fearsome Boss Battle!
description.short: Master the art of absorbing your enemies! Be the last orb alive by changing into a color that destroys your enemies and makes you stronger. New and more challenging orbs await as you progress to the fearsome Boss Battle!
